title: 397. The Power Within: Be Your Own Best Friend
itunes:title: 397. The Power Within: Be Your Own Best Friend
description: In today's episode, Andy talks about why nobody is obligated to solve your problems, how you can become a person who is self-sufficient to achieve big goals, and why you should call yourself out on your shortcomings as well as encourage yourself when needed.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy talks about why nobody is obligated to solve your problems, how you can become a person who is self-sufficient to achieve big goals, and why you should call yourself out on your shortcomings as well as encourage yourself when needed.
